title: Bug 18641IllegalArg exception while deleting projects/closing editors
description: I just started eclipse up with many editors open (non of them where activatedyet)1) select 3 projects (all JUnit project)2) execute delete  push yes to delete the contents.Got the message dialog: Error restoring editor.Below is the stack trace with the illegal argument exception.
